body:
Alexa,

your link above is broken, could you please fix it?

cherrs,

vangelis



<grego> Here is ours, currently in press:
<grego>
<grego> A. I. Ruppertsberg and M. Bloj, 2006, Rendering complex scenes for
<grego> psychophysics
<grego> using RADIANCE: how accurate can you get?, J. Opt. Soc. Am. A, in
<grego> press.
<grego>
<grego> for a free download of the non-typeset version go here:
<grego> http://josaa.osa.org/upcoming_pdf.cfm?id=63954
<grego>

subject: [Radiance-general] validation's broken link
